home.heading: How does it work?
home.paragraph: If you're looking for travel inspiration, you are in the right place! With us, you can discover new places in several ways:

item1.title: Visit the map section:
item1.description: There you can see interesting places that will show up during your armchair travel.

item2.title: Visit the suggestions section:
item2.description: There you'll find a list of places selected according to the latest trends, divided into categories.

item3.title: Enter your preferences in the right-side form
item3.description: Here you can provide information about places you like, dislike, and desired features, so we can show suggestions tailored to you.
